title: The Howling II
description: For Karyn it was the howling. The howling that had heralded the nightmare in Drago... the nightmare that had joined her husband Roy to the she-wolf Marcia and should have ended forever with fire. But it hadn't.Roy and Marcia were still alive, and deadly, and thirsty for the most horrifying vengeance imaginable...
author: Gary Brandner
